name: TABS io
description:
TABS io is the most addictive io game that will keep you hooked for hours!
Collect followers from anywhere on the map! Grab other players' followers to eliminate them! Lead hundreds of people and show them who's the boss!
If you are having trouble finding people to pick up into your crowd, try checking out the popular buildings wars and areas. If you hang out around the entrances, you can easily rack up a bunch of people!
